x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

The She-Trial Connect solution can revolutionize women’s health participation by making clinical trials more accessible, inclusive, and transparent. Using ServiceNow’s AI Agents and Workflow Data Fabric, it can match eligible participants in minutes instead of months, increase female representation in research, and empower NGOs and hospitals with real-time dashboards.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Integrating multiple clinical-trial databases with different standards may pose data consistency challenges. Ensuring HIPAA/GDPR compliance, maintaining AI accuracy, and driving adoption among healthcare partners while supporting multilingual, inclusive access will require careful planning and collaboration.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Implementing She-Trial Connect may face challenges such as integrating diverse clinical-trial data sources and ensuring compliance with HIPAA and GDPR standards. Maintaining AI accuracy and fairness, driving adoption among hospitals and NGOs, and supporting multilingual, accessible user experiences will also require careful design, data governance, and ongoing collaboration with healthcare partners.
